description:
is a puzzle memory game.
Initially you are shown a quick glimpse to where all the objects are before all tiles are wiped and you must collect the items or reach the exit.

Multiple object types
Token: Gives the player more points when collected.
BadToken: Removes points from the player when collected.
Boot: Gives the player more moves when collected.
Blocker: Stops the player from moving over this tile.
Exit: The end of the level/
Light: Reveals objects in a small radius around its position when collected.
Warp: Randomly moves the player to a position that hasnt been discovered already, if all have been discovered moves the player to the exit.
Map: Reveals all objects in the stage when collected.

Controls:
Simple WASD movement keys to move the player to the highlighted sections.
Otherwise mouse clicks to navigate UI elements. (Grid is not clickable sorry)
